title: Hot Stove: Nationals to talk to Sosa
subtitle: Hot Stove: Sosa D.C.-bound?
body: Sammy Sosa could be coming back to the National League.  According to multiple sources, the Washington Nationals have expressed interest in the free agent outfielder, who spent last year with the Baltimore Orioles and needs only 12 homers to reach career homer No. 600.  Washington general manager Jim Bowden was expected to have discussions with Sosa's agent this weekend. Jim Molony is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Jim Molony
